# NONMEM toolbox

```{r}
nonmem_toolbox()
```

```{r}
nonmem_toolbox(nonmem_exe = "/software/nonmem/nonmem741_openleap43/run/nmfe74",
               nmcheck_exe = "/software/nonmem/nonmem741_openleap43/tr/NMTRAN.exe")
```

```{r}
nonmem_toolbox(nonmem_exe = "/usr/local/bin/nmr",
               nonmem_call = "{nonmem_exe} -local {control_file}",
               nmcheck_exe = "/usr/local/bin/nmr",
               nmcheck_call = "{nmcheck_exe} -test {control_file}")
```
